item.title: 日本央行女董事提名获下议院批准
item.description: 日本国会下议院确认了小田顺子加入日本央行政策委员会，基本上确保了她将获得批准，这一进展支持了日本央行逐步提高基准利率的努力。【原文：Japan’s lower house of parliament confirmed Junko Koeda to join the Bank of Japan’s policy board, essentially ensuring she’ll be approved, in a development that supports the bank’s quest to raise its benchmark rate at a gradual pace.】

item.title: 关税风险受质疑，市场闪现美元疲劳曙光
item.description: 越来越多的人猜测，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收新关税的主要目的是作为一种谈判工具，这破坏了押注美元的流行交易。【原文：Growing speculation the new tariffs threatened by US President Donald Trump are mainly intended as a negotiating tool are undermining the popular trade of betting on the dollar.】

item.title: 决策指南》：风险加剧，罗马尼亚将延长利率暂停期
item.description: 由于当地政治动荡和全球贸易紧张局势给罗马尼亚通胀预测带来的风险不断增加，罗马尼亚央行可能在第四次会议上维持利率不变。【原文：Romania’s central bank is likely to hold interest rates for a fourth meeting as risks to its inflation forecast pile up from local political turmoil and global trade tensions.】

item.title: 大米价格飙升 82%，日本将紧急供应大米
item.description: 日本将从紧急库存中出售 21 万吨大米，因为家庭正在以创纪录的价格购买大米。【原文：Japan will sell 210,000 tons of rice from its emergency stockpiles as households are paying record prices for the grain.】

item.title: JX Advanced 首次公开募股募资 30 亿美元，创日本 2018 年以来最大纪录
item.description: 一家重要的全球半导体材料供应商正在寻求首次公开募股，以筹集约 4600 亿日元（约合 30 亿美元）的资金，这将是日本自 2018 年以来最大的此类交易。【原文：An initial public offering from a key global supplier of semiconductor materials is seeking to raise about ¥460 billion ($3 billion) in what would be Japan’s biggest such deal since 2018.】

item.title: 苹果公司计划在今年年中对中国 iPhone 进行人工智能改造
item.description: 苹果公司正努力在今年年中之前将其人工智能功能引入中国，从而加快了这项复杂工作的进程。【原文：Apple Inc. is working to bring its AI features to China by the middle of this year, accelerating a complex undertaking that has required software changes and deep reliance on local partners.】

item.title: 科技股走强，香港中国股市逼近十月高点
item.description: 随着中国人工智能能力的不断增强，投资者对市场前景持乐观态度，香港中资股延续了近期的涨势。【原文：Chinese stocks in Hong Kong extended a recent rally as the nation’s growing capabilities in artificial intelligence kept investors optimistic over the market’s outlook.】

item.title: 特朗普承诺的互惠关税是什么？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在承诺发动 "大关税 "之后，于2月13日签署了一项措施，指示其政府提出一轮所谓的互惠关税，这可能会重塑美国与世界的贸易关系。如果许多国家对世界最大经济体的出口最终被征收更重的税，那么美国就有可能面临通胀上升、其他地方经济活动放缓的风险。特朗普提名的商务部领导人霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示【原文：After promising to unleash “the big one,” President Donald Trump signed a measure Feb. 13 directing his administration to propose a round of so-called reciprocal tariffs that could remodel America’s trading relationship with the world. If exports from a multitude of countries to the world’s biggest economy end up being taxed more heavily, there’s a risk of higher inflation in the US and slower economic activity everywhere else. item.title: Canva 在印度取得进展后在新兴市场测试廉价计划
item.description: Canva 公司在印度赢得了对价格敏感的客户之后，正在将其低成本计划推广到更多新兴市场，以扩大其创意设计软件的用户群。【原文：Canva Inc. is taking its low-cost plans to more emerging markets to expand the user base of its creative design software, after winning over price-sensitive customers in India.】

item.title: 中国的 DeepSeek 热潮照亮了阿里巴巴和百度的人工智能前景
item.description: 在人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 突然崛起之后，中国科技财报将于下周拉开帷幕，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司和百度公司的前景将成为关键。【原文：Chinese tech earnings kick off next week with Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s and Baidu Inc.’s outlook key after the sudden rise of artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek.】

item.title: 日本开始与美国谈判以了解特朗普关税的具体内容
item.description: 日本开始与美国谈判，以了解美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划采取的互惠关税措施的细节，因为这个亚洲国家正在为潜在的后果做准备。【原文：Japan began talks with the US to find out the details of President Donald Trump’s planned reciprocal tariff measures, as the Asian nation braces for potential fallout.】

item.title: 普拉博沃称新印尼基金将拥有 9000 亿美元资产
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）表示，印尼新的主权财富基金将于2月24日启动，并将投资于一系列行业，他将加大力度促进经济增长，实现8%的目标。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto said the nation’s new sovereign wealth fund will start on Feb. 24 and invest in a range of industries as he steps up efforts to boost growth to his goal of 8%.】

item.title: 穆迪经济学家认为菲律宾暂停加息出人意料，预测将于四月降息
item.description: 唯一一位准确预测菲律宾央行周四意外决定维持政策利率不变的分析师预测，暂停不会太久，宽松政策可能最快在四月恢复。【原文：The lone analyst who accurately predicted the Philippine central bank’s surprise decision on Thursday to maintain its policy rate is forecasting that the pause won’t be long and easing may resume as soon as April.】

item.title: DeepSeek 为星际之门前景蒙上阴影，熊市包围软银
item.description: 对于软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp.）的投资者来说，DeepSeek 是一个重大障碍，因为他们希望该公司股价能借助人工智能热潮的复苏，重新攀上历史高点。【原文：For SoftBank Group Corp. investors looking for the stock to climb back to all-time highs on a revival of the artificial intelligence boom, DeepSeek poses a major hurdle.】

item.title: 司法部致函苹果公司后，苹果公司将恢复 TikTok 在美国应用商店的销售
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在美国司法部长帕姆-邦迪（Pam Bondi）致函苹果公司后，苹果公司将于周四恢复字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）的 TikTok 在美国应用程序商店的销售。【原文：Apple Inc. will restore ByteDance Ltd.’s TikTok to the US App Store on Thursday, following a letter from US Attorney General Pam Bondi, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普关税承诺刺激避险需求，黄金价格接近历史纪录
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下令对多个国家征收对等关税，增加了贸易和全球经济的不确定性，黄金在纪录高位附近持稳。【原文：Gold was steady near a record high after President Donald Trump’s order for reciprocal tariffs against several nations increased uncertainty around trade and the global economy.】

item.title: 强气旋将于周五袭击澳大利亚铁矿中心
item.description: 澳大利亚的铁矿石出口枢纽正在为周五晚些时候登陆的大型热带气旋做好准备，皮尔巴拉地区的港口设施、矿山和基础设施将受到冲击。【原文：Australia’s iron ore export hub is bracing for a major tropical cyclone to make landfall later Friday, with port facilities, mines and infrastructure in the Pilbara region in the firing line.】

item.title: 英国将全面改造电网队列以加快去碳化进程
item.description: 英国能源监管机构 Ofgem 打算批准该国电网运营商提出的一项建议，即彻底改革发电项目接入电网的排队程序。【原文：UK energy regulator Ofgem is minded to approve a proposal by the country’s grid operator to overhaul the queue for power generation projects looking to connect to the network.】

item.title: 贸易战迫在眉睫，2024 年新加坡经济稳健收官
item.description: 新加坡去年年底的经济表现强于最初的预期，这使得政府在大选年能够更好地应对全球不确定性和选民对生活成本的担忧。【原文：Singapore’s economy ended last year on a stronger note than initially expected, putting the government in a better position to navigate global uncertainties and voters’ cost of living anxieties in an election year.】

item.title: 财政部表示，新西兰必须解决资本成本过高的问题
item.description: 新西兰财政部长伊恩-雷尼（Iain Rennie）表示，新西兰需要解决资本成本高的问题，这是导致其生产率增长乏力的主要原因。【原文：New Zealand needs to address its high cost of capital, which is a key driver of its poor productivity growth, Treasury Secretary Iain Rennie said.】

item.title: 特朗普互征关税加剧贸易紧张局势，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 由于市场消化了唐纳德-特朗普总统可能对美国贸易伙伴征收对等关税的命令所带来的影响，石油市场趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied as the market digested the fallout from President Donald Trump’s order of potential reciprocal tariffs on US trading partners.】

item.title: PHMSA 称宾夕法尼亚州 Sunoco 燃油泄漏已持续 16 个月
item.description: 根据监管机构的初步调查，Sunoco LP 公司运营的一条输油管道至少在 16 个月内泄漏过喷气燃料，污染了宾夕法尼亚州的居民水井，而且该管道可能有发生更多事故的风险。【原文：A pipeline operated by Sunoco LP leaked jet fuel for at least 16 months, contaminating residential water wells in Pennsylvania, and the conduit may be at risk for further incidents, according to a preliminary investigation by regulators.】

item.title: 调查显示，国债将遭受特朗普关税虚张声势的影响
item.description: 彭博市场实时脉搏调查显示，投资者担心美国国债市场进一步走软，因为他们寄希望于唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税威胁成为现实。【原文：Investors are bracing for further weakness in the US Treasury market as they bank on President Donald Trump’s tariff threats becoming reality, the Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse survey showed.】

item.title: 秘鲁因强劲增长和全球风险而停止主要降息措施
item.description: 秘鲁周四维持利率不变，原因是经济增长加速和美国贸易政策的不确定性限制了采取更具扩张性的货币政策的空间。【原文：Peru left interest rates unchanged Thursday as accelerating economic growth and uncertainty over US trade policy limit the space for a more expansionary monetary stance.】
